verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He paid a debt He did not owe. I owed a debt I could not pay. I needed someone to wash my sins away. And now I sing a brand new song. “Amazing Grace”. Christ Jesus paid a debt that I could never pay.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Father God, He loves me so. And only He knows what’s within. He sent that someone, and now I’m born again. Christ Jesus paid a debt that I could never pay.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For I am weak but He is strong. And with His help, I’ll get along. Now I’ve got someone to wash my sins away. And now I sing a brand new song, “Amazing Grace”. Christ Jesus paid a debt that I could never pay.{/lang-eng}
